Navigation
Name Tutor/Markup

Synopsis Markup directives for creating concept pages.
Details StructureMarkup QuestionMarkup InlineMarkup
Description The MarkedText in each section of a concept is plain text. Some characters or text strings are used to influence the markup of the text. We distinguish:
  • Structure markup influences the structure of the text.
  • Inline markup influences the markup for characters or words.
Markup that is not recognized by the Tutor is included in the generated HTML. This makes it possible to use common HTML idioms like <blockquote>, , etc. in concept pages.
